#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int i,t,n,arr1[1000],arr2[1000],sum,j=0;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
	    j++;
	    memset(arr1,0,sizeof(arr1));
	    memset(arr2,0,sizeof(arr2));
	    sum=0;
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>arr1[i];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>arr2[i];
        sort(arr1,arr1+n);
        sort(arr2,arr2+n);
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            sum+=(abs(arr1[i]-arr2[i]));
        }
        cout<<"Case "<<j<<": "<<sum<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
